text:
i think the final marginal buyers of the ai trade will be the government, specifically the military

Mag7 are ramping up capex because they know they can. they’re calling bluff. 

the worst case scenario they will be bailed out by money printer for reasons of national defense

i
thesis: Government/military will be the ultimate marginal buyer of AI, creating a floor under AI stocks

text:
delusional bull case that i choose to believe

>recent tech sell off equivalent to COVID shock levels
>trump dishes out stimmy's leading into midterms
>ai capex grows but govt/military becomes biggest buyers
>final bullrun on risk assets as USD goes to ATL's

just refuse to https://t.co/ySS7Ca6U7H
thesis: Tech sell-off → stimulus → military becomes biggest AI buyer → final bullrun as USD debases

text: if this is the ai cold war then metals bull run makes sense and probably continues
thesis: AI cold war between US and China implies metals/commodities supercycle

text: idea: american manhattan project but for agi
thesis: US will launch Manhattan Project-scale AGI program — massive government AI spending

text:
Remove 90% of regulations 

Just let American workforce rawdog capitalism

It's not a choice anymore

It's economic war at this point

American's tech dominance is at threat

It isn't a coincidence that the closest we are to World War 3 is microchips
thesis: Deregulation is existential necessity for US tech dominance — not political, it's economic warfare

text:
the better ai gets - the bigger the implications become on national defence and military

america will not allow ai wave to stop, they will not run the risk of losing to china, they will spend to infinity to ensure that this does not happen

i don't see any other outcome
thesis: US government will spend unlimited money to win AI race — no scenario where AI capex slows

text: by end of 2027 how much do you think military will be spending on compute? https://t.co/8N2d7ViYbJ
thesis: Military compute spending will dwarf current levels by 2027

text: China is PVPing American tech monopoly
thesis: China is actively competing with US tech monopoly — this is a tech cold war

text: AGI will be the biggest global narrative in 2025
thesis: AGI will dominate 2025 investment narratives globally — everything gets repriced around AI

text: AI coins top when AI tops
thesis: AI token cycle follows fundamental AI progress, not crypto market — AI improving = AI tokens go up

text: Missed Nvidia? Buy AI coins
thesis: AI crypto tokens are the retail-accessible proxy for NVDA-style AI exposure

text:
People are thinking about this wrong

Current AI projects will benefit from new models like DeepSeek

They're going to just replace calling the OpenAI API to the DeepSeek one & overnight outputs should improve

New models don't disrupt agents, they accelerate them
thesis: New foundation models HELP existing AI projects — they swap APIs and get better overnight. Don't sell AI on model releases.
ideal_instruments: LONG existing AI projects during model FUD

text: agents cant open bank accounts. crypto is literally the only way they can hold and move money autonomously.
thesis: AI agents need crypto for autonomous finance — crypto is the ONLY financial rails for AI agents

text: AI coins dip for 2 weeks then go up for 4 weeks straight
thesis: AI tokens follow predictable 2-week dip / 4-week rally cycles — time entries accordingly
ideal_instruments: AI token basket — buy 2 weeks into dips, sell 4 weeks into rallies

text: The biggest AI coins will just keep getting bigger because they’re going to be the new alt coins
thesis: AI tokens replace altcoins as dominant speculative assets — power law concentration

text:
I don't think the AI trade is over by the way.

It's just really difficult for people to bid/hold in this rotation heavy market.

There's a ton of builders still grinding though and eventually a few teams will have breakout announcements that sparks the entire sector up again.
thesis: AI trade is paused not dead — breakout announcements will reignite entire sector

text: SOL to $4800
thesis: Solana to $4800 — massive price target based on ecosystem growth trajectory

text:
SOL 25 going to be like ETH 21

Renaissance of new ideas, builders and biblical runs. https://t.co/DEXoqv7hip
thesis: Solana 2025 = Ethereum 2021 — same renaissance of builders, ideas, and price runs

text:
solana defi incoming wave 2026 imo

eth defi is currently still 10x bigger than sol

jupiter is still worth less than uniswap

still no big lending protocols on sol yet

i think we'll see sharp venture start to rotate from AI to crypto 

and i believe most of that flow will be
thesis: Solana DeFi massively undervalued vs Ethereum DeFi — 10x gap will close in 2026

text:
perp dex war ends with hyperliquid winning 

it's gonna happen too https://t.co/7nQ3IxaJIn
thesis: Hyperliquid wins the perp DEX war — consolidation play

text: hyperliquid probably best app in crypto history
thesis: Hyperliquid is the best product in crypto history — product quality drives long-term dominance

text: trump might have solved the national debt https://t.co/FN2NpH5CLi
thesis: Trump + Bitcoin could restructure US fiscal position — massive macro implications

text:
to be clear this bull market will rage on

all roads lead to the debasement of the dollar

thank you for the dips along the way though
thesis: Dollar debasement is inevitable regardless of path — all risk assets go up

text:
trump & bitcoin barbell might be the safest, easiest 10x over the next 4 years

ai coins & hyperliquid the riskier barbell for a potential 10x-100x in 1 year
thesis: Trump + Bitcoin barbell = safest 10x over 4 years. AI coins + Hyperliquid = riskier but higher upside

text:
i dont know how to price in kevin warsh being a really smart guy who seems to be on the money about everything he’s saying

can only hope it means asset prices go up via pure iq mogging, no jester
thesis: Kevin Warsh as potential Fed chair is bullish — smart policy = asset prices up

text: they are crashing market to boost employment https://t.co/WUwwYdjv31
thesis: Market crashes are engineered policy — buy the dip, it's manufactured
ideal_instruments: SPY puts during crash → flip to calls

text: might be a crazy thought but if a single company is making 57B in a quarter… why would it slow down if more money is coming into system via rate cuts + stimmy?
thesis: If a single company makes $57B/quarter, rate cuts + stimulus only accelerate — no slowdown

text: The crypto GTA will likely launch organically on pump fun
thesis: First major crypto-native game will launch via token platforms, not traditional publishers

text: By Q2-Q3 indie game developers will launch through pump fun
thesis: Game dev funding shifts from publishers to token launches — disrupts traditional gaming

text: AI slop increases demand for genuine human shit
thesis: AI-generated content creates premium for authentic human content — human creators more valuable

text:
Yes, your coins are down right now but who cares? 

The president of the united states just launched a memecoin on the Solana blockchain. 

Throw everything you thought you knew out the window. It's going to get insane. 

We were right. We are right. Everyone is coming HERE.
thesis: POTUS launching a memecoin on Solana = paradigm shift. Everything you knew is outdated.

text:
The only Americans in TRUMP right now are people that know how to use Jupiter or Kraken users.

Most of America is still sidelined.
thesis: Most of America is still sidelined from crypto — massive onboarding wave coming

text:
The trenches have discovered low float, high FDV coins.

Get used to coins going to billions.

A paradigm shift is happening and will likely define the next wave of this cycle.
thesis: Paradigm shift: low float high FDV tokens will go to billions — new normal
ideal_instruments: Low float tokens with strong catalysts

text:
doxxed devs + lock supply + og github repo with bunch of green squares + active good twitter

there’s the formula, now go lock in and print trillions 🤝
thesis: Winning token formula: doxxed devs + locked supply + real GitHub + good Twitter
ideal_instruments: Tokens meeting all 4 criteria — use as screening filter

text: for 16 years the biggest existential threat to crypto was regulatory and now the american government is finally legalizing it and you’re bearish?
thesis: Crypto's 16-year regulatory overhang is lifting — this is the most bullish structural change ever

text: Whether he knows it or not, Trump is now incentivized to legalize and regulate crypto as fast as humanly possible.
thesis: Trump is personally incentivized to legalize/regulate crypto ASAP — aligned interests

text: Skills as a Service will be the new SaaS
thesis: AI shifts software from products to on-demand skills — SaaS business models disrupted

text: I hope by the end of 2025, I can replace my search engine with X
thesis: X/Twitter displaces Google search for real-time information — search market disruption

text:
It's hard to price the value creation explosion that will result from OpenClaw being open source.

It's the best tech experience I've had in over decade of using internet. It sounds like hyperbole, but it is insane to use a piece of software that tangibly gets better as you use
thesis: OpenClaw open source creates a Cambrian explosion of AI businesses — ecosystem play

text:
shorting software on a piece of software

gl with that
thesis: You can't short the thing you're increasingly dependent on — software bears are using the product they're shorting

text: if you're bearish ai, you're bearish america
thesis: Being bearish AI = being bearish America. The US government won't allow it.

text: Over the next 3 days, TRUMP will have a biblical run similar to the run that happened with Elon and DOGE leading up to SNL
thesis: $TRUMP will rally hard into inauguration — same pattern as DOGE before Elon's SNL

text: Pudgy Penguins team is probably one of the best teams in all of crypto
thesis: Pudgy Penguins has one of the best teams in crypto — long PENGU

text: AGI will be open source
thesis: AGI will be open source — proprietary AI moats erode, open ecosystem wins

text: It’s all going to be open source and a lot of them will have a token.
thesis: Open source AI + tokenization = new business model. Every open source project gets a token.
ideal_instruments: AI tokens tied to real open source repos

text: @AlexFinn I find no personal need for local models & I don’t think anyone should really use them if they are starting out. But definitely agree that you’re on cutting edge and it’s worthy experimentation.
thesis: Local models + lab models will co-exist — demand for compute 1000x's from current levels

text: Trump might actually send Bitcoin to $1M
thesis: Bitcoin to $1M under Trump — crypto macro supercycle

text:
i really think this cycle has rewarded chronically online people disproportionately to any other group

of course there are outliers/edge cases

but almost all wealth opportunities rewarded being chronically online

bome (random presale bottom bear)
hyperliquid (perps addiction)
thesis: This cycle rewards being chronically online more than any other trait — attention = alpha
